introduction: A story of ronin living in the impoverished outskirts of Edo come together to fightagainst the evil rich Hanya crime family. The action begins when a woman escapesfrom their clutches with the help of a brave ronin who is willing to put his life on theline and stand tall against the brutal town bosses. Ichikawa Utaemon gives one of hisbetter performances as Tsugumo Hanbei, a man among men. While others mayquake in fear he rises to the occasion. The fighting is fast and furious in this superbtale of old japan! (TV broadcast quality)
